thread.section_title: The Westbridge Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A Great Find.
thread.title_full: A Great Find. - Review of The Westbridge Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Glynis D
title: A Great Find.
text: We stayed here for the second time in 3 months. The staff members are extremely helpful and pleasant, our room was very comfortable and spotlessly clean. We chose a continental breakfast as it offered a great choice. The train/underground station is a 5/6 minute walk away as is the Westfield shopping centre. We certainly hope to make a return visit.
